test-case.name: runtimeExceptionWithNumberFormatExceptionIsNull
test-case.description: Use Case: RuntimeException that could not be mapped by EclipseLinkJpaDialect directly. Cause of RuntimeException is not an SQLException.

test-case.name: jpaOptimisticLockExceptionIsConcurrencyFailureException
test-case.description: Use Case: PersistenceException that can be mapped by EclipseLinkJpaDialect into corresponding DataAccessException.

test-case.name: jpaSystemExceptionWithNumberFormatExceptionIsNull
test-case.description: Use Case: PersistenceException that could not be mapped by EclipseLinkJpaDialect directly but instead is wrapped into JpaSystemException. Cause of PersistenceException is not an SQLException.

test-case.name: runtimeExceptionWithSqlDeadLockExceptionIsConcurrencyFailureException
test-case.description: Use Case: RuntimeException that could not be mapped by EclipseLinkJpaDialect directly. Cause of RuntimeException is an SQLException.

test-case.name: jpaSystemExceptionWithSqlDeadLockExceptionIsConcurrencyFailureException
test-case.description: Use Case: PersistenceException that could not be mapped by EclipseLinkJpaDialect directly but instead is wrapped into JpaSystemException. Cause of PersistenceException is an SQLException.
